name: py-quick-start
title: Py Quick Start
author: TwentyEighty
description: Similar to other quickstart mods but uses Pyanodon construction robots. Includes plates, miners, personal roboport, pynobots. Based on quick-start by Pasukaru. If Teleporters is available and pyhightech is on, make them easier to research and produce. If Aircraft is available and pyhightech is on, make first aircraft available under logistic science.
